T02D2184:40b-1: karma kra ma n'a ma mukti k'a ba li /
T02D2184:40b-3: las kyi rim pa mu tig phreng ba zhes bya ba /
T02D2184:40b-4: 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang rdo rje bsnams //
T02D2184:40b-5: spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal la //
T02D2184:40b-6: sku gsung thugs kyi mthu ldan pas //
T02D2184:40b-7: nyon mongs gdung bzhi byed pa //
T02D2184:40b-8: zhabs kyi padma la btud nas //
T02D2184:40b-9: ngang bas shin tu gus phyag 'tshal //
T02D2184:40b-10: sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir //
T02D2184:40b-11: las kyi rdo rje phreng ba 'di //
T02D2184:40b-12: rgyud rnams ma lus sna tshogs nas //
T02D2184:40b-13: man ngag dgos pa btus te bshad //
T02D2184:40b-14: rgyal bas sngon gyi dus dag tu //
T02D2184:40b-15: zhal nas gsungs pa tsam gyis ni ;
T02D2184:40b-16: / sems can don grub glegs bam med //
T02D2184:40b-17: de ltar rtsod pa'i dus su ni //
T02D2184:40b-18: po ti dag la brten gyur pas //
T02D2184:40b-19: bla mas dgongs pa'i po ti la //
T02D2184:40b-20: dga' ba chen po bskyed par bya //
T02D2184:40b-21: de nas ma ga gang zag la //
T02D2184:40b-22: ston pa thugs rje che ldan pas //
T02D2184:40b-23: sdud pa rdo rje gsang bdag la //
T02D2184:40b-25: bka' dang mi 'gal mthun pa ru //
T02D2184:40b-26: bka' yi don nyid dpyis phyin par //
T02D2184:40b-27: man ngag rim pa bstan pa la //
T02D2184:40b-28: dga' ba chen po bskyed par gyis //
T02D2184:40b-29: man ngag 'di ltar ston pa ni //
T02D2184:40b-30: slob dpon mkhas pa yang dag ldan //
T02D2184:40b-31: dus gsum bde gshegs dang mtshungs pa //
T02D2184:40b-32: shin tu drin che gus pas bstod //
T02D2184:40b-33: sems can mun khang 'khyams pa la //
T02D2184:40b-34: mar me bstan pas lam rnyed bzhin //
T02D2184:40b-36: man ngag rin chen 'di bstan pas //
T02D2184:40b-37: phyag rgya mchog gi lam rnyed 'gyur //
T02D2184:40b-38: de bas shin tu drin che bas //
T02D2184:40b-39: yul zhing sne phran bcas pa dang //
T02D2184:40b-40: rin chen la sogs nor rdzas dang //
T02D2184:40b-41: bu dang chung ma bran 'khor bcas //
T02D2184:40b-42: srog lus man chad phul gyur kyang //
T02D2184:40b-44: de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis //
T02D2184:40b-45: bla ma mnyes par mi byed na //
T02D2184:40b-46: man ngag thob kyang ltung bar 'gyur //
T02D2184:40b-47: gzhan yang rgyud ni sna tshogs las //
T02D2184:40b-48: bstan pa bsrung ba'i don slang du //
T02D2184:40b-49: mthu yi sbyor ba'i man ngag rnams //
T02D2184:40b-50: dgos pa bsdus te bstan par bya //
T02D2184:40b-51: de lta'i bla ma rin chen la /
T02D2184:40b-52: gong ma bzhin du shes par bya //
T02D2184:40b-53: man ngag bstan pa'i slob ma la //
T02D2184:40b-54: rnam pa bzhi ru shes byas la //
T02D2184:41a-1: ltar nang ltar gsang ba ltar //
T02D2184:41a-2: de kho na nyid bzhi ru bstan //
T02D2184:41a-3: phyi ltar bstan pa'i slob ma yang //
T02D2184:41a-4: dang po dkyil 'khor bcug nas ni //
T02D2184:41a-5: bum pa'i dbang bskur rdzogs byas la //
T02D2184:41a-6: mi zad dbyings kyi chos rnams bshad //
T02D2184:41a-7: des su rtogs pa'i rim pa ni //
T02D2184:41a-8: thun mong dam tshig nyams blangs la //
T02D2184:41a-9: nyams na bshags la brtson par bya //
T02D2184:41a-10: nyams pa chen po byung ba na //
T02D2184:41a-11: bshags nas rim par bskyar bar bya //
T02D2184:41a-12: de ni slob dpon nyid las blang //
T02D2184:41a-13: gzhan gyi skabs dang sbyor shes bya //
T02D2184:41a-14: khrus la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnams //
T02D2184:41a-15: nyams su blangs te spyad par bya //
T02D2184:41a-16: de yi rnal 'byor mos pa ni //
T02D2184:41a-17: mas mtha' thun tshod chung du gcig / nyin zhag 'dus na nyams par 'gyur //
T02D2184:41a-18: dang por bskyed rim bsgom pa ni //
T02D2184:41a-19: rim gyis sam ni cig car du //
T02D2184:41a-20: bskyed pa brtan par gyur pa'i chad //
T02D2184:41a-21: thun tshod chen po brtan pa dang //
T02D2184:41a-22: kha dog spros par shes pa dang //
T02D2184:41a-23: lus ngag yid gsum skyon rnams ni //
T02D2184:41a-24: rim gyis bri bar gyur pa dang //
T02D2184:41a-25: khyad par lus kyi skyon bri'o //
T02D2184:41a-26: lus kyi mdog bzang lus snyoms dang //
T02D2184:41a-27: yun rings btang yang mi tshor na //
T02D2184:41a-28: bskyed pa'i rim pa brtan pa'i tshe //
T02D2184:41a-29: de nas gsang dbang bskur nas ni //
T02D2184:41a-30: nang ltar bstan nas rim gyis bsgom //
T02D2184:41a-31: de ltar phyi yi gang zag ni //
T02D2184:41a-32: de nas mar la 'gro ba dkon //
T02D2184:41a-33: skye ba 'di rjes phyi ma ru //
T02D2184:41a-34: rten dang dbang po khyad par 'gyur //
T02D2184:41a-35: de ni rim gyis 'bras bu thob //
T02D2184:41a-36: nang ltar bshad pa'i slob ma ni //
T02D2184:41a-37: phyi ltar thun mong sngon du 'gro //
T02D2184:41a-38: nang ltar man ngag khyad par bstan //
T02D2184:41a-39: de nas rlung dang gtum mo dang //
T02D2184:41a-40: yig 'bru thig le rnams la bslab //
T02D2184:41a-41: de yang gsang dbang bskur nas ni //
T02D2184:41a-42: rlung dang yig 'bru bsgom par bya //
T02D2184:41a-43: de la brtan par gyur nas ni //
T02D2184:41a-44: snang ba gsum la rim gyis bslab //
T02D2184:41a-45: de nas tshe ni nam 'phos nas //
T02D2184:41a-46: gong ma rnams la rim gyis bslab //
T02D2184:41a-47: gsang ba ltar ni bstan pa yis //
T02D2184:41a-48: slob ma de la gong ma gnyis //
T02D2184:41a-49: thun mong du ni sngon du 'gro //
T02D2184:41a-50: shes rab ye shes dbang bskur nas //
T02D2184:41a-51: gnyis po la ni zhugs nas su //
T02D2184:41a-52: man ngag stobs zhugs ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2184:41b-0: bde ba ye shes rim skyes @41b nas //
T02D2184:41b-1: snang ba mched par gyur pas su //
T02D2184:41b-2: kun rdzob sgyu ma ji bzhin pa //
T02D2184:41b-3: thugs su chud pa'i stobs kyis ni //
T02D2184:41b-4: lhan cig dga' ba la zhugs pas //
T02D2184:41b-5: spos med 'od gsal de bzhin thob //
T02D2184:41b-6: de nas rim gyis mthar thugs //
T02D2184:41b-7: thob par de ni ma gyur kyang //
T02D2184:41b-8: tshe dbang bsgrub pas thob pa'am ;
T02D2184:41b-9: / yang na rdzas dang man ngag dang //
T02D2184:41b-10: thabs kyi sbyor ba la sogs kyis //
T02D2184:41b-11: phung po bzhu btul byas nas su //
T02D2184:41b-12: gser 'gyur rtsi bzhin gyur nas kyang //
T02D2184:41b-15: byang chub sems kyi man ngag blang //
T02D2184:41b-16: de ltar mi 'dod man ngag blangs //
T02D2184:41b-17: skye ba phyi ma dag tu ni //
T02D2184:41b-18: mthar thug pa ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D2184:41b-20: tshe dbang bsgrub pa'i man ngag ni //
T02D2184:41b-21: tshe dbang bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor ni //
T02D2184:41b-22: dam tshig ldan zhing yon tan ldan //
T02D2184:41b-23: skyon spangs dbang thob man ngag thob //
T02D2184:41b-24: rgyud kyi don mkhas cha rkyen tshad //
T02D2184:41b-25: dam can mkha' 'gro bsten pa yis //
T02D2184:41b-26: lung bstan phra mo thob nas kyang //
T02D2184:41b-27: tshe srog nyams pa 'tsho bar byed //
T02D2184:41b-29: tshe yi rang bzhin gnas dang ni //
T02D2184:41b-30: ming zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs ni //
T02D2184:41b-31: de yi tshe yi rang bzhin ni //
T02D2184:41b-32: 'od zer kha dog lnga dkyil na //
T02D2184:41b-33: thig le byang chub sems zhes bya //
T02D2184:41b-35: de yang che chung rab 'bring gsum //
T02D2184:41b-36: sran ma yungs 'bru shin tu phra //
T02D2184:41b-37: mu stegs dag gis de la 'khrul //
T02D2184:41b-39: de ni dam pa'i don du 'dod //
T02D2184:41b-40: 'jig rten pa yi skad du ni //
T02D2184:41b-41: bla dang tshe zhes kyang ni zer //
T02D2184:41b-42: bdag cag rnal 'byor pa yi gzhung //
T02D2184:41b-43: de ni kun rdzob sgyu mar 'dod //
T02D2184:41b-44: dam pa'i don du rang bzhin med //
T02D2184:41b-45: gnas ni tsitta'i dkyil na gnas //
T02D2184:41b-46: de yang rtsa brgyad dkyil na gnas //
T02D2184:41b-47: shin tu rtogs dka' dh'u t'i'i nang //
T02D2184:41b-48: de nyid dbye na rnam gsum ste /
T02D2184:41b-49: de la brten pa'ang rnam pa gsum //
T02D2184:41b-51: gcig ni lus kun khyab par gnas //
T02D2184:41b-52: de la gzhan dag gnyis su 'dod //
T02D2184:41b-53: khyad par gnas dang las kun byed //
T02D2184:41b-54: kha cig khyad byed de kun la //
T02D2184:41b-55: lud cing zag pa thur du 'bab //
T02D2184:41b-56: gzhan ni kun du khyab cing rgyu //
T02D2184:41b-57: de la'ang las kyi 'phen shugs kyis //
T02D2184:42a-0: @42a * // mang po la ni rgyu ru 'dod //
T02D2184:42a-1: srog dang dbang po che zhes pa //
T02D2184:42a-2: ming gi rnam grangs nyid du 'dod //
T02D2184:42a-3: de yang rlung dang rtsa dang ni //
T02D2184:42a-4: byang chub sems su byas pas na //
T02D2184:42a-5: tha dad nyid du 'dod pa'ang yod //
T02D2184:42a-6: shes pa bsdus dang ma bsdus pa //
T02D2184:42a-7: gnas skabs don gyis 'jug pa yin //
T02D2184:42a-8: tshe bsgrub pa'i cho ga ni /
T02D2184:42a-9: rang gi snying gar 'od kyi gzhal yas khang //
T02D2184:42a-10: de yi dkyil na aa dkar gnyis //
T02D2184:42a-11: phra 'dus zla ba kha sbyor gyur //
T02D2184:42a-13: rdo rjer gyur pas steng 'og mnan //
T02D2184:42a-15: drag po sbyor ba la sogs kyis ;
T02D2184:42a-16: / sngags brjod phyag rgya bcas nas su //

T02D2184:42a-19: bsrung zhing ye shes che yang dbab //
T02D2184:42a-20: dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni //

T02D2184:42a-23: aom badzra a'a yu she h'um /
T02D2184:42a-24: a'a be sha ya a'a a'a /
T02D2184:42a-25: lus la mar rim bzhin du bstim /
T02D2184:42a-26: khyad par snying gi dkyil du bstim //
T02D2184:42a-27: bam yig dmar po 'phros pa las //
T02D2184:42a-28: man ngag la sogs sbyor bas bcing //
T02D2184:42a-29: bsdu zhing gzung ba'i man ngag ni //
T02D2184:42a-30: shes rab la sogs thabs kyis bstan //
T02D2184:42a-31: tshe yi yon tan la sogs ni //
T02D2184:42a-32: rgyud la sogs las shes par bya //
T02D2184:42a-33: tshe dang dum bu rnam smin gsum //
T02D2184:42a-34: de gsum thabs sogs mthun pa yang //
T02D2184:42a-35: gcig la gcig bstan mdung khyim 'dra //
T02D2184:42a-36: yi ge gsum gyi man ngag kyang //
T02D2184:42a-37: gnas gsum dag tu bcing ba yin //
T02D2184:42a-38: sbyor ba la sogs bcing bar bya //
T02D2184:42a-39: de ni tshe sgrub man ngag go //
T02D2184:42a-40: byang sems blang ba'i man ngag kyang //
T02D2184:42a-41: de yang rnal 'byor spyod pa yi //
T02D2184:42a-42: mkhas pas 'chi rtags shes nas ni //
T02D2184:42a-43: rin chen 'bar ba'i snod nang du //
T02D2184:42a-44: blangs nas mtshal chen dang sbyar nas //
T02D2184:42a-45: sbyor ba'i stobs kyi shangs su 'phang //
T02D2184:42a-46: rnam shes rlung la zhon pa de //
T02D2184:42a-47: dang po rten dang bral tsam na //
T02D2184:42a-48: sngags bzlas 'od zer stobs kyis su //
T02D2184:42a-49: snying ga nyid du bcing bar bya //
T02D2184:42a-50: de nas snga ma'i rten la gzhug / sbyor ba la sogs gzhan yang myur bar bya //
T02D2184:42a-51: gzhan yang gsang ba spyod pa ni //
T02D2184:42b-0: @42b mdzad pa'i dus ni rnam gsum ste //
T02D2184:42b-1: dang po bdud rtsi spyod pa la //
T02D2184:42b-2: mos pas 'jug dang dngos la 'jug / mos pas 'jug pa gzhan dang mthun //
T02D2184:42b-3: dngos su 'jug pa'i thabs bstan pa //
T02D2184:42b-4: bdud rtsi rtsa ba lnga btsal la //
T02D2184:42b-5: rang gi lus las btsal bar bya //

T02D2184:42b-8: bza' ba dang po rim gyis bslab //

T02D2184:42b-14: de rnams par gyi 'tsho ba ni //
T02D2184:42b-15: nang gi bdud rtsi slar bsdams la //
T02D2184:42b-16: bza' zhing btung ba nyid du bya //
T02D2184:42b-17: de rnams bag la zha nas ni //
T02D2184:42b-18: bar bar gong bzhin bza' bar bya //
T02D2184:42b-19: yang na rim bzhin de bzhin lnga ba //
T02D2184:42b-20: de nas nang gi rgyud bzlog gis //
T02D2184:42b-21: rim bzhin lus rnams gso bar bya //
T02D2184:42b-22: lus ni shin tu rgyas gyur na //
T02D2184:42b-24: man ngag stobs kyis zhugs pa yis //
T02D2184:42b-25: mi rtog ye shes skye bar 'gyur //
T02D2184:42b-26: yang na bogs ni dbyung ba'i thabs //
T02D2184:42b-27: nang gi gso thabs spo ba dang //
T02D2184:42b-28: phyi yi gso thabs spo ba dang //
T02D2184:42b-29: lus la rdzas rnams byugs pa yis //
T02D2184:42b-31: thabs des skye bar ma gyur na //
T02D2184:42b-32: man ngag bsgom pas spo bar bya //
T02D2184:42b-33: des kyang skye bar ma gyur na //
T02D2184:42b-34: gnas la sogs pa spo bar bya //
T02D2184:42b-35: spos kyang skye bar ma gyur na //
T02D2184:42b-36: 'byung po'i gnod pa yod pa yin //
T02D2184:42b-37: 'byung po bsal ba'i thabs rnams bya //
T02D2184:42b-38: 'byung po bsal kyang ma byung na //
T02D2184:42b-39: sngon gyi bag chags mthug pas ni //

T02D2184:42b-41: des kyang skye bar ma gyur na //
T02D2184:42b-42: tha mi dad pa'i 'du shes kyis //
T02D2184:42b-43: dkyil 'khor la sogs spos pa yis //
T02D2184:42b-45: des kyang skye bar ma gyur na //
T02D2184:42b-46: slob dpon man ngag nyams pa yin //
T02D2184:42b-47: slob dpon dam tshig nyams pas kyang //

T02D2184:42b-50: slob dpon dam tshig nyams sogs la //

T02D2184:42b-52: rang gi man ngag nyams pa dang //

T02D2184:43a-52: phyag rgya mchog gi man ngag cung zhig tsam //

T02D2184:43b-2: bstan pa bsrung ba'i don slad du //
T02D2184:43b-3: las kyi phreng ba gzhan yang bstan //

T02D2184:43b-6: sku gsung thugs las byung ba yi //

T02D2184:43b-8: / zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa de //

T02D2184:43b-24: ngag gi bzlas pa byed tshul yang //

T02D2184:43b-27: bzlas pa byas pas mtshan ma rnyed //
T02D2184:43b-28: des su 'byung bar ma gyur na //
T02D2184:43b-29: sbyang ba byas te bzla bar bya //

T02D2184:43b-36: lha yi sbyor ba spo ba yang //
T02D2184:43b-37: de bzhin du ni shes par bya //
T02D2184:43b-38: gnas la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni //
T02D2184:43b-39: gzhan pa dag kyang spo bar bya //
T02D2184:43b-40: lha rnams so so spo ba yang //
T02D2184:43b-41: gzhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa dang //
T02D2184:43b-42: zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa dang //
T02D2184:43b-43: zhal bzhi phyag ni brgyad pa dang //
T02D2184:43b-44: phyag mtshan rnams kyang 'gyur ba dang //
T02D2184:43b-45: sku mdog la sogs 'gyur ba rnams //
T02D2184:43b-46: so so'i rgyud dang bstun pa yin //
T02D2184:43b-47: sngags la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yang //
T02D2184:43b-48: de bzhin du ni shes par bya //
T02D2184:43b-49: khyad par las rnams so so'i sngags //
T02D2184:43b-50: aom ma h'a k'a l'a ya //
T02D2184:43b-51: ya ti pra ti dzny'a sma ra si ta di dam /
T02D2184:43b-53: kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D2184:44a-5: di na mi ke na h'um h'um phat /
T02D2184:44a-7: aom bi lam ba h'um h'um phat /
T02D2184:44a-22: sngags 'di dag thams cad yi ge 'bum bzlas pas 'grub par byed do //
T02D2184:44a-23: mgon po'i las ni thun mong pa'i las so //
T02D2184:44a-24: sbyin sreg dag gis gsad pa ni /
T02D2184:44a-25: gru gsum nag po'i thab khung du //
T02D2184:44a-26: shin tu drag po'i me lha bsam //
T02D2184:44a-27: sbyang zhing byin gyis brlab pa dang //
T02D2184:44a-28: bsdus rgyas myur ba'i rim pa rnams //
T02D2184:44a-29: man ngag la sogs shin tu gab //
T02D2184:44a-30: mchod pa dbul ba'i rim pa ni //
T02D2184:44a-31: tsha ba'i mar dang tsher ma ca na //
T02D2184:44a-32: til nag po dang dug chus byug / aom ma
T02D2184:44a-33: h'a k'a la ming 'di zhes bya ba sha tr'u
T02D2184:44a-35: ces brgya rtsa brgyad dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2184:44a-36: mngon par bsgrub pa'i las drag shul shi ba'i ro bzung la //
T02D2184:44a-37: de ni yang ni gtub par bya //
T02D2184:44a-38: stong par byin brlabs yi ge las //
T02D2184:44a-39: bsgrub bya ci 'dra de la bsam //
T02D2184:44a-40: lcags kyus snying drang rlung gis bteg / rnam par shes pa de la bstim //
T02D2184:44a-41: rdo rje phur bus de la brdeg / bsad nas me la sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2184:44a-42: me yi lha la brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02D2184:44a-43: ming nas smos pa de la dbul //
T02D2184:44a-44: lha la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis ni //
T02D2184:44a-45: dbul bar dgra yi ming de gzhug /'bum la brgyad kyis bstabs la dbul //
T02D2184:44a-46: de ni dur khrod gdon rnams kyis //
T02D2184:44a-47: 'du zhing de nyid za bar bsam //

T02D2184:44a-49: bcu gnyis phyed dang de yi phyed //
T02D2184:44a-50: 'chi bar de ni gdon mi za //
T02D2184:44a-51: bsreg pas gsad pa'i las rim mo /
T02D2184:44a-53: // / gzhan yang ting 'dzin rim pa yis //
T02D2184:44a-54: gsad pa rab tu brtsam par bya //
T02D2184:44a-55: 'di ni bsam pa tsam gyis kyang //

T02D2184:44a-57: gdug pa khro bo'i sems kyis ni //
T02D2184:44a-58: de yi lte ba'i rtsa ba la //
T02D2184:44a-59: rnal 'byor can gyis lag pa gcad //
T02D2184:44a-60: ming gi yi ge dang po las //
T02D2184:44b-0: gsad bya mdun du bsam @44b bar bya ;
T02D2184:44b-1: / rnam shes de la bcug nas ni //
T02D2184:44b-2: kha sbyar nang nas gnas mthong nas //
T02D2184:44b-3: de phyung srog dang dbral mthong nas //
T02D2184:44b-4: ro ni dum bu stong du gtub //
T02D2184:44b-5: bza'am yang na gtor ma bya //

T02D2184:44b-30: yang na gling bcad 'khor lo bcad //
T02D2184:44b-31: gro ga'am dur khrod ras ma la //
T02D2184:44b-32: gzugs dang ming ni bris pa gzhug / de steng
T02D2184:44b-33: de gshed gzugs rnams gzhug / smin par byed pas
T02D2184:44b-34: kha bcad nas // de steng gzhan gyis dgag par bya //
T02D2184:44b-35: gnag dang dkar bas rgya gram bcing //

T02D2184:45a-7: gzhan yang 'khor los gsad pa ni //

T02D2184:45a-29: gru gsum nag po'i gting brus la //

T02D2184:45a-32: aom ma h'a k'a la sha tr'un m'a ra ya phat /

T02D2184:46b-7: ting 'dzin sbyor ba'ang de bzhin bsam //

T02D2184:46b-9: yang na drag po'i 'brub khung du //
T02D2184:46b-10: tsher ma can gyi shid bkang ste //
T02D2184:46b-11: ram las drag po'i me dpung bsam //
T02D2184:46b-13: bsgrub bya'i ming ni bris nas kyang //
T02D2184:46b-15: bsgrub bya bkug nas bstim par bya //
T02D2184:46b-16: drag po yi ni sngags kyis bsreg /'chi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za //
T02D2184:46b-17: sbyor ba la sogs gzhan po yang //
T02D2184:46b-18: man ngag can gyis sbyor shes bya'o //

T02D2184:46b-21: // / rakta'i las kyi phreng ba yis //
T02D2184:46b-22: gsad pa'i las 'di brtsam par bya //
T02D2184:46b-23: dmar zhing chags pa'i rang bzhin can //
T02D2184:46b-24: khog pa'i rten ni btsal bar bya //
T02D2184:46b-25: 'od ma'i gzhu ni lta bu yi //
T02D2184:46b-26: dkyil du de nyid bzhag nas kyang //
T02D2184:46b-27: dus la de ni bab pa yi //
T02D2184:46b-28: smin byed dang po rgyug pa dang //
T02D2184:46b-29: mdongs dang ldan pa'i mtshal chen gnyis //
T02D2184:46b-30: bsres la sngags ni gdab par bya //
T02D2184:46b-31: dus tshod gsum du bsgrubs nas kyang //
T02D2184:46b-32: bsgrub bya'i 'og tu sbas na ni //
T02D2184:46b-34: yang na 'od ma lta bu'i dkyil //
T02D2184:46b-35: 'dab brgyad dang ni ldan pa la //
T02D2184:46b-36: kha mthing la sogs mes spar la //
T02D2184:46b-37: dbang byed sngags ni bzlas pas su ;
T02D2184:46b-38: / nges pa kho nar khugs par 'gyur //
T02D2184:46b-39: aom rakta pri ya ni h'um che ge mo ba shim ku ru h'um /
T02D2184:46b-40: sbyor ba la sogs gzhan po yang //
T02D2184:46b-41: man ngag stobs kyis phye bar yang //
T02D2184:46b-42: rakta bri ya nis gsad pa'i las kyi rim pa'o /
T02D2184:46b-44: // / mam sa bag tris gsad pa ni //
T02D2184:46b-45: sngon du 'gro ba rdzogs byas la //
T02D2184:46b-46: sha zan de ni stong dag gi / rten la sogs pa rdzogs byas la //
T02D2184:46b-47: bug pa can gyi snod nang du //
T02D2184:46b-48: rdo rje'i mchu ni sbyar nas kyang //
T02D2184:46b-50: de yi sbyor ba ma zhig par //

T02D2184:47a-3: gsad pa'i man ngag sbyor shes bya //
T02D2184:47a-4: aom m'am sa bag tri che ge mo sha tr'un m'a ra ya phat /
T02D2184:47a-5: mam sa bag tris gsad pa'i las kyi rim pa'o /
T02D2184:47a-7: // / gzhan yang rdzas kyis gsad pa ni //
T02D2184:47a-8: da du ra dang 'ol ma se //
T02D2184:47a-9: 'gu phat tam dang khu bar sbyar //
T02D2184:47a-10: thabs la mkhas pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2184:47a-11: mi la blud na smyo bar 'gyur //
T02D2184:47a-12: gsol ba 'debs na gso bar bya //
T02D2184:47a-13: khu ba la sogs rnams kyis ni //
T02D2184:47a-14: lus la byugs shing khong du blud //
T02D2184:47a-15: des ni nges par thar par 'gyur //
T02D2184:47a-16: gsad pa'i sbyor ba'i las rnams kyang ;
T02D2184:47a-17: / sangs rgyas la sogs bstan pa ni //
T02D2184:47a-18: 'jig rten pa la sogs nges pa dang //
T02D2184:47a-19: ru dra nag por gyur pa la //
T02D2184:47a-20: sbyor ba 'di ni bya bar gsungs //
T02D2184:47a-21: de las gzhan du byas pa na //
T02D2184:47a-22: rang nyid nyams te dmyal bar ltung //
T02D2184:47a-23: de yi sbyor ba byed pa yang //
T02D2184:47a-24: tshad med sngon du 'gro byas la//
T02D2184:47a-25: man ngag the tshom med par ni //
T02D2184:47a-26: byas na gdon mi za bar 'grub //
T02D2184:47a-27: de yang bsgral bya'i yul de la //
T02D2184:47a-28: lus ngag yid gsum zhi bas ni //
T02D2184:47a-29: tshul dang mthun pa'i bden pa bdar //
T02D2184:47a-30: lan gsum byas kyang ma nyan na //
T02D2184:47a-31: ltung bar mi 'gyur bya bar gsungs //
T02D2184:47a-32: bsad pa las kyi phreng ba'o /
T02D2184:47a-34: // / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku gsung thugs kyi mnga' bdag la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2184:47a-35: drag po sku yi sbyor ba dang //
T02D2184:47a-36: gsung dang thugs kyi sbyor ba dang //
T02D2184:47a-37: las ni gzhan sogs sbyor ba dang //
T02D2184:47a-38: rdzogs pa mthar thug sbyor ba rnams //
T02D2184:47a-39: rim pa bzhin du bstan par bya //
T02D2184:47a-41: zhal gcig gam ni gnyis pa'am //
T02D2184:47a-42: zhal gsum pa'am phyag drug pa //
T02D2184:47a-43: gang 'dod pa ni bskyed par bya //
T02D2184:47a-44: des su bsnyen pa rdzogs byas la //
T02D2184:47a-45: ro bsregs thal ba'i 'jim pa la //
T02D2184:47a-46: nag po'i gzugs brnyan byas pa la //
T02D2184:47a-47: de nyid sbyin sogs bskyed byas la //
T02D2184:47a-48: sngags bzlas pa yi stobs kyis su //
T02D2184:47a-50: gtor ma la sogs byin nas kyang //
T02D2184:47a-51: bstod cing gsol ba btab pas su //
T02D2184:47a-53: drag po'i gru gsum thab khung du //
T02D2184:47b-0: gdug pa can gyi me @47b sbar nas //
T02D2184:47b-1: mar nag tsha ba gsum dang ni //
T02D2184:47b-2: sha khrag gsum gyi rdzas bsregs la //
T02D2184:47b-3: bsgrub bya bkug ste de la bstim //
T02D2184:47b-4: drag po'i sngags ni bzlas nas kyang //
T02D2184:47b-5: rdzas rnams me yi nang gtor bas //
T02D2184:47b-8: gtor ma la sogs sbyor ba yis //
T02D2184:47b-9: gsad pa'i man ngag sbyor ba ni //
T02D2184:47b-10: brtul zhugs can gyis sbyor shes byas //
T02D2184:47b-11: de nas gsung gi nag po yi //
T02D2184:47b-12: sbyor ba bstan pa gang yang mthun //
T02D2184:47b-13: thugs kyi nag po'i sbyor ba yang //
T02D2184:47b-14: gzhan du brgal te bstan pa na //
T02D2184:47b-15: brtul zhugs can gyis sbyor shes bya'o //
T02D2184:47b-16: gsum ka la yang bzhi bzhir bstan //
T02D2184:47b-17: dper na rgyal po blon po dang //
T02D2184:47b-18: las byed 'khor dang mi mthun phyogs //
T02D2184:47b-19: de bzhin bde gshegs sprul pa dang //
T02D2184:47b-20: sa nas rig pa 'dzin pa dang //
T02D2184:47b-21: dam can dam la gnas pa dang //
T02D2184:47b-22: des su gdul bar bya ba bzhin //
T02D2184:47b-23: de bzhin mkhas pas shes par bya'o //
T02D2184:47b-24: de rnams sku gsung thugs kyi don //
T02D2184:47b-25: bsdus pa bstan pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D2184:47b-26: sku gsung thugs kyis gsad pa'i las kyi rim pa'o /
T02D2184:47b-28: // / las kyi rim pa gzhan bstan par bya ste //
T02D2184:47b-29: grong khyer dkrug pa'i cho ga ni //
T02D2184:47b-30: rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar gnas pas //
T02D2184:47b-31: sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs byas te //
T02D2184:47b-32: nag po chen po lnga brtsal la //
T02D2184:47b-33: sngags kyi 'khor lo'i phreng ba bri //
T02D2184:47b-34: mthun pa'i rdzas kyis dgad bar bya //
T02D2184:47b-35: sngags bzlas pas na don rnams 'grub //
T02D2184:47b-36: aom aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha sv'a h'a /
T02D2184:47b-37: sngags ni khri tsho re re bzlas //
T02D2184:47b-38: nag po 'bar ba kha bcad do //
T02D2184:47b-39: grong gi dkyil dang phyogs bzhi ru //
T02D2184:47b-40: rked nub tsam du brkos nas su //
T02D2184:47b-41: de dag sa gter sba bar bya //
T02D2184:47b-42: thod pa la sogs snod nang du //
T02D2184:47b-43: mthun pa'i rdzas ni bsag par bya //
T02D2184:47b-44: mkha' 'gro ma yi dgra sngags bzlas //
T02D2184:47b-45: de yang grong khyer gseb du bskyal //
T02D2184:47b-46: bdun bdun par ni bcad byas la //
T02D2184:47b-47: de ltar byas na grong khyer 'khrug / grong khyer dkrug pa'i las kyi rim pa'o /
T02D2184:47b-49: // / char ni dbab pa'i rim pa yang //
T02D2184:47b-50: dang por bsnyen sbyor goms pa yis //
T02D2184:47b-51: rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar bskyed la //
T02D2184:47b-52: rdzas rnams bsags pa'i thabs dag ni //
T02D2184:48a-2: klu yi rgyal po mtha' yas kyi //
T02D2184:48a-3: gzugs brnyan byas la kham phor du //
T02D2184:48a-4: bzhag nas bdud rtsi sogs kyis dgang //
T02D2184:48a-5: ba nag 'o mas bkang nas ni //
T02D2184:48a-6: gzhon nu nag mos bkal ba yi //
T02D2184:48a-7: skud pa yis na bcing bar bya //
T02D2184:48a-8: rlung lha'i phyogs su rdzing bu bya //
T02D2184:48a-9: klu yi rgyal po de ru bzhag / de yi 'gram du dkyil 'khor bya //
T02D2184:48a-10: sol ba rus pa ldong ros dang //
T02D2184:48a-11: so phag lo ma rus phye la //
T02D2184:48a-12: nag po dkar po ser po dang //
T02D2184:48a-13: dmar po ljang gu'i sa tshon bya //
T02D2184:48a-14: dur khrod srad bus thig gdab bo //
T02D2184:48a-15: dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni //
T02D2184:48a-16: de yi dbus su mtha' yas bzhag / mgon po'i bdag po chen po bzhi //
T02D2184:48a-17: rgyud bzhi dang ni bstun nas kyang //
T02D2184:48a-18: gang mos mgon pos gnan par bya //
T02D2184:48a-19: bdud rtsi me tog nag po dang //
T02D2184:48a-20: 'du byed khu ba glang po'i chang //
T02D2184:48a-21: blugs dang mchod pa dbul bar bya //
T02D2184:48a-22: rang gis rnal 'byor rnam pa yis //
T02D2184:48a-23: bzlas pa'i man ngag shes byas te //
T02D2184:48a-24: sngags bzlas pas ni char dbab pa'o //
T02D2184:48a-25: gal te mi 'bab de yi tshe //
T02D2184:48a-27: sprin dbral ba yi thabs rnams ni //
T02D2184:48a-28: dur khrod ras la nyer 'dug nas //
T02D2184:48a-30: aom a'arya shma sh'a na pri y'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat /
T02D2184:48a-32: sprin pa bsdus shing sprin dral bas //
T02D2184:48a-33: gseb nas char ni 'bab par bsam //
T02D2184:48a-34: char dbab pa'i sngags bzlas pa /
T02D2184:48a-37: ma sha ma sha gha ta gha ta /
T02D2184:48a-38: gho ta ya gho ta ya /
T02D2184:48a-39: aa nanta ksho bha ka r'a ya n'a g'a dhi
T02D2184:48a-40: pa ta ye he he ru ru kam sapta p'a
T02D2184:48a-41: t'a la gat'a na n'a g'a karsha ya barsha ya
T02D2184:48a-45: des ni char rnams mi 'bab na /
T02D2184:48a-46: sngags bzlog nas bzlas pas char 'bab bo //
T02D2184:48a-47: des char mi 'bab na mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro /
T02D2184:48a-49: // / char sogs bzlog pa'i cho ga ni //
T02D2184:48a-50: rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar gnas pas //
T02D2184:48a-51: sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs byas la //
T02D2184:48a-52: dur khrod sol ba'i rdzas dag la //
T02D2184:48a-53: sngags de bzlas shing btab pas su //
T02D2184:48a-54: de nas nam mkhar gtor bar bya //
T02D2184:48b-0: de ltar @48b byas pas bzlog par 'gyur //
T02D2184:48b-1: des ni bzlog par ma gyur na //
T02D2184:48b-2: gnas ni dben par gnas byas te //
T02D2184:48b-3: bdag nyid legs par bsrung byas la //
T02D2184:48b-4: bdag gi lus ni mer bsgoms te //
T02D2184:48b-5: gzhan nas kyang ni me byung nas //
T02D2184:48b-6: 'jig rten thams cad mes gang bsam //
T02D2184:48b-7: sngags kyi 'od zer las me byung //
T02D2184:48b-8: char ba la sogs bsregs par bsam //
T02D2184:48b-9: des kyang bzlog par ma gyur na //
T02D2184:48b-10: glog phreng gi ni sbyor ba las //
T02D2184:48b-11: ji ltar 'byung zhing bzlog par bya'o //
T02D2184:48b-12: des ni nges par bzlog par 'gyur //
T02D2184:48b-13: char dang ser ba la sogs pa bzlog pa'i cho ga rdzogs so /
T02D2184:48b-16: // / rnal 'byor pa la sogs pa ni //
T02D2184:48b-18: phung po bsreg par bya ba ni //
T02D2184:48b-19: rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pas su //
T02D2184:48b-20: sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs byas te //
T02D2184:48b-21: lha yi gnang ba thob par bya //
T02D2184:48b-22: lha yi gnang thob ma gyur na //
T02D2184:48b-23: sems ni las su rung bar bya //
T02D2184:48b-24: sems 'dzin nus par ma gyur na //
T02D2184:48b-25: dus dang grangs kyi bsnyen pa ni //
T02D2184:48b-26: mos dang ldan pas rdzogs byas la //
T02D2184:48b-27: de nas brtsam par bya ba yin //
T02D2184:48b-28: de yang thun mong sngon song nas //
T02D2184:48b-29: phyis ni bsnyen pa gso don du //
T02D2184:48b-30: bsdu na lnga dang gsum du bya //
T02D2184:48b-31: dang po 'chi rtags brtag par bya //
T02D2184:48b-32: bdag nyid phyag na rdo rjer bskyed ;
T02D2184:48b-33: / skad cig tsam mos thugs kar ni //
T02D2184:48b-34: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du //
T02D2184:48b-35: yi ge h'um gi 'od zer gyis //
T02D2184:48b-36: bla ma la sogs spyan drangs la //
T02D2184:48b-37: phyag 'tshal mchod cing bshags pa dang //
T02D2184:48b-38: rjes su yi rang bskul ba dang //
T02D2184:48b-39: gsol ba gdab cing skyabs su 'gro //
T02D2184:48b-40: lus dbul dge rtsa bsngo bar bya //
T02D2184:48b-41: tshad med bzhi dang stong nyid bsgom //
T02D2184:48b-42: stong pa'i dang las che ga ni //
T02D2184:48b-43: rnam pa lngas bskyed bde gshegs tshul //
T02D2184:48b-44: cho ga gsum bskyed sems dpa'i tshul //
T02D2184:48b-45: de yang myur bar bskyed 'dod na //
T02D2184:48b-46: stong pa'i dang las sa bon byung //
T02D2184:48b-47: de nyid 'phros pas sku bskyed ngo ;
T02D2184:48b-48: / zhal gcig phyag gnyis autpala mdog / mche ba gtsigs pa sgeg dang bcas //
T02D2184:48b-49: rdo rje gsor zhing sdigs mdzub 'chang //
T02D2184:48b-50: 'od kyi sprul pa'i dkyil na gnas //
T02D2184:48b-52: nyi zla'i gdan la zhabs kyis brten //
T02D2184:48b-53: ye shes kyi ni mthu bskyed cing //
T02D2184:49a-1: gyis brlabs pa la sogs bya //
T02D2184:49a-2: sku de nyid ni brten par bsgom //
T02D2184:49a-3: gshin rje srog gcod de la yang //
T02D2184:49a-4: bden pa'i tshig gis bka' bsgo bya //

T02D2184:49a-6: gtor ma yang ni gtang bar bya //
T02D2184:49a-7: de nas rnam shes 'pho ba'i phyir //
T02D2184:49a-8: man ngag stobs kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2184:49a-9: rna ba'i drung du sngags 'di bzlas //
T02D2184:49a-10: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rdo rje bsam //
T02D2184:49a-11: aom na mo bha ga ba te /
T02D2184:49a-12: sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha ne r'a dz'a ya //
T02D2184:49a-13: ta th'a ga t'a ya yarha te samyaksam baddha ya /
T02D2184:49a-15: aom bhya ma bhya bi ni /
T02D2184:49a-17: sarba bya bi ni shi pa ya hri /
T02D2184:49a-20: h'um ru dra dang yi te /
T02D2184:49a-21: kshu ru draksha ra pi sarba ni h'um ru draksha
T02D2184:49a-22: ra pi sarba ni h'um ru dre sa ru pe
T02D2184:49a-24: a'atma ke / h'um bindu sha re re /
T02D2184:49a-25: aom shag tri sam shag tri sa ma sha tris yo dza ni /
T02D2184:49a-26: ma byo ma yo dza ni /
T02D2184:49a-27: bho sha ta kee ba lye ba de hma bidhye na ma /
T02D2184:49a-28: a'um h'um h'um ltum kshum kshum kshum na /
T02D2184:49a-30: byo ma bya pi ni po sha ta /
T02D2184:49a-31: de nas gsang sngags 'di yis ni //
T02D2184:49a-32: mi bskyod gnas ni nyams dga' ba //
T02D2184:49a-33: dga' dang 'chi ba rnam spangs par //
T02D2184:49a-34: rnam par shes pa byung nas 'gro //
T02D2184:49a-35: de yi tshangs pa'i sgo nas ni //
T02D2184:49a-37: bzhin ni rab tu 'dzum byed cing //
T02D2184:49a-38: ro ni ngo mtshar phyag rgyar ldan //
T02D2184:49a-39: de lta bu yi sems can de la ni //
T02D2184:49a-40: bar ma do yi gnas dag tu //
T02D2184:49a-42: mi bskyod pa dang tha mi dad //
T02D2184:49a-44: cha lugs 'dzin pa nyid du lta //
T02D2184:49a-45: de yi sdig pa bsdus nas kyang //
T02D2184:49a-46: khog pa'i rten la bsdu bar bya //
T02D2184:49a-47: ga phur gur kum la sogs pa'i //
T02D2184:49a-48: spos kyi chu yis bkru bar bya //
T02D2184:49a-49: dri ma med pa'i ras la ni //
T02D2184:49a-50: byin gyis brlabs nas g-yogs par bya //
T02D2184:49a-51: rol mo'i cha byad dang ldan pas //
T02D2184:49a-52: dur khrod dgon pa'i gnas su bskyal //
T02D2184:49a-53: de nas ro ni bsreg bya ste //
T02D2184:49a-54: sa dang sta gon cho ga dang //
T02D2184:49a-55: slob dpon las dang dkyil 'khor bsgrub //
T02D2184:49a-56: de nas ro ni bsreg par bya //
T02D2184:49a-57: yang na sta gon byas rting la //
T02D2184:49a-58: bsreg par bya ba nyid du bya //
T02D2184:49a-59: sa ni brtag dang bslang ba dang //
T02D2184:49a-60: sbyang dang byin gyis brlabs pa dang //
T02D2184:49a-61: gzung dang bsrung ba nyid du bya //
T02D2184:49b-0: de rnams zhib tu bya ba @49b yang ;
T02D2184:49b-1: / dkyil 'khor spyi rgyud gzhan dang mthun //
T02D2184:49b-2: de nas mandala steng du ni //
T02D2184:49b-3: thig le byas te tshom bu dgram //
T02D2184:49b-4: lha bskyed pa'am lha sprul pa //

T02D2184:49b-6: byin brlabs dbang bskur byas nas ni //
T02D2184:49b-7: phyi mchod nang mchod gsang mchod dang //
T02D2184:49b-8: rdo rje glu dang gar sogs kyis //
T02D2184:49b-9: mchod cing bstod pa rgyas par bya //
T02D2184:49b-10: gsol ba btab ste snyan gsan dbab //
T02D2184:49b-11: de nas sbyin sreg dag gis sbyang //
T02D2184:49b-12: bum pa byin gyis brlab pa yang //
T02D2184:49b-13: bya dang mi bya gnyis su bstan //
T02D2184:49b-14: byed na cho ga gzhan dang mthun //
T02D2184:49b-15: slob ma sta gon gnas pa yang ;
T02D2184:49b-16: / gshin dang gson ni gnyis su bstan //
T02D2184:49b-17: mi bskyod gnas na gnas pa der //
T02D2184:49b-18: dbang bskur byed na 'dir bkug la //
T02D2184:49b-19: sta gon yang ni rgyas par bya //
T02D2184:49b-20: sta gon byed pa'i tshul rnams kyang //
T02D2184:49b-21: gson la byed pa ji bzhin bya //
T02D2184:49b-22: dbang bskur de ni mi byed na //
T02D2184:49b-23: sta gon de yang mi bya ste //
T02D2184:49b-24: mi bskyod gnas su bzhag nas ni //
T02D2184:49b-25: byin brlabs byas te smon lam gdab //
T02D2184:49b-26: ro de nyid ni byin brlabs la //
T02D2184:49b-27: sreg khang thur la khru do'am //
T02D2184:49b-28: khru gang rko ba che chung tshad //
T02D2184:49b-29: rgyar yang gru bzhi khru do'am //
T02D2184:49b-30: mu rang sor brgyad bcu drug tshad //
T02D2184:49b-31: kha dog dkar po zlum zhing 'khyil //
T02D2184:49b-33: / phyi rol bri dang mi bri dang //
T02D2184:49b-34: 'bri bar rgyan rnams gzhan dang mthun //
T02D2184:49b-35: rgyan rnams thams cad rdzogs par dgram //
T02D2184:49b-36: shing rnams dri dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2184:49b-37: 'jag ma ku sha la sogs kyis //
T02D2184:49b-38: thab khung 'og tu gding bar bya //
T02D2184:49b-39: phung po shar du kha bstan te //
T02D2184:49b-40: tsog pur bcas te gzhag par bya //
T02D2184:49b-41: shing rnams mchod rten dbyibs su brtsig / phyi ni mchod rten dbyibs 'dra la //
T02D2184:49b-42: kha dog dkar por byas nas kyang //
T02D2184:49b-43: skar khung bzhi ni gtod par bya //
T02D2184:49b-44: mchod rdzas la sogs bkram nas kyang //
T02D2184:49b-45: bdag nyid bskyed pa rdzogs byas la //
T02D2184:49b-46: pho brang byin gyis brlabs nas kyang //
T02D2184:49b-47: me lha rgyal po bskyed par bya //
T02D2184:49b-48: ye shes me lha spyan drangs la //
T02D2184:49b-49: bgegs bstsal mchod cing bstod pa bya //
T02D2184:49b-50: ye shes dgug cing bstims byas la //
T02D2184:49b-51: rgyas gdab dam tshig bsgo ba dang //
T02D2184:49b-52: dbang bskur byas nas mchod par bya //
T02D2184:50a-2: / me lha shar lhor bzhugs pa'am //
T02D2184:50a-3: yang na thugs kar pho brang bca' //
T02D2184:50a-4: ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs bstim //
T02D2184:50a-5: byin brlabs la sogs rdzogs byas la //
T02D2184:50a-6: phyi mchod nang mchod gsang mchod bya //
T02D2184:50a-7: de nas rtsa ba'i sngags la ni //
T02D2184:50a-8: sdig pa zhi byed sngags bzlas la //
T02D2184:50a-9: bar du ming ni gzhug par bya //
T02D2184:50a-10: nyi shu rtsa gcig brgya ru bzlas //
T02D2184:50a-11: mchod rdzas g-yon du bkram nas kyang //
T02D2184:50a-12: sreg rdzas g-yas su dgram par bya //
T02D2184:50a-13: mar dang yam shing zho dang ni //
T02D2184:50a-14: mngar gsum 'bras can la sogs pa //
T02D2184:50a-15: rim pa bzhin du dbul bar bya //
T02D2184:50a-16: tha mar dgang blugs phul nas ni //
T02D2184:50a-17: mchod cing bstod de gsol ba gdab //
T02D2184:50a-19: gshegs su gsol te dam tshig bsdu //
T02D2184:50a-20: tha ma me yi lha la ni //
T02D2184:50a-21: cho ga gong bzhin bsdus te bya //
T02D2184:50a-22: ye shes me lha gshegs nas ni //
T02D2184:50a-23: dam tshig me lha bsdu bar bya ;
T02D2184:50a-24: / de ltar rten dang sdig bshags la //
T02D2184:50a-25: brten po gong bzhin bkug nas ni //
T02D2184:50a-26: pho brang gnyis su bca' byas nas //
T02D2184:50a-27: rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar gnas pas //
T02D2184:50a-28: dkyil 'khor cho ga ji bzhin par //
T02D2184:50a-29: dkyil 'khor bcug la dbang bskur bya //
T02D2184:50a-30: de nas smon lam gdab par bya //
T02D2184:50a-31: mi bskyod pa yi gnas dag tu //
T02D2184:50a-32: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng bzhag ste //
T02D2184:50a-34: de ltar byed pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2184:50a-35: man ngag lag len goms pa yis //
T02D2184:50a-36: sbyangs nas bde 'gror nges par skye //
T02D2184:50a-37: rim gyis byang chub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2184:50a-38: ngan song gsum na 'khyams na yang //
T02D2184:50a-39: sngags la sogs pa'i mthu rnams kyis //
T02D2184:50a-40: dus de ru ni shin tu bde //
T02D2184:50a-41: de nas myur du thar bar byed //
T02D2184:50a-42: gzhan yang dur khrod rus pa ni //
T02D2184:50a-43: lo brgya'am lo stong lon pa la //
T02D2184:50a-44: bsreg pa la sogs byas pa na //
T02D2184:50a-45: sdug bsngal las ni thar bar 'gyur //
T02D2184:50a-46: rus pa med na ming sogs la //
T02D2184:50a-47: cho ga byas na thar bar 'gyur //
T02D2184:50a-48: nyams su ma lon cho ga 'khrugs //
T02D2184:50a-49: rang nyid dmyal bar 'gro ba'i rgyu //
T02D2184:50a-50: de bas mkhas pas bsgrims te bya'o //
T02D2184:50a-51: phung po rten dang bcas pa yi //
T02D2184:50a-52: bsreg pa las kyi rim pa ai thi /
T02D2184:50b-0: // / rdzogs pa'i man ngag @50b bstan pa ni //
T02D2184:50b-1: rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms la //
T02D2184:50b-2: lte ba snying ga mgrin pa dang //
T02D2184:50b-3: mgo bo yi ni gnas dag tu //
T02D2184:50b-4: sprul pa chos kyi sku dang ni //
T02D2184:50b-5: longs spyod bde chen gnas zhes bya //
T02D2184:50b-6: lte bar drug cu rtsa bzhi la //
T02D2184:50b-7: gsal byed yi ge nyis lnga ba dgod //
T02D2184:50b-8: snying gar sde tshan yang po brgyad //
T02D2184:50b-9: mgrin par a'a li bcu drug dgod //
T02D2184:50b-10: dung khang gi ni gnas dag tu //
T02D2184:50b-11: a'a li gnyis ni bzlas par bya //
T02D2184:50b-12: bde ba chen gyi ni gnas dag tu //
T02D2184:50b-13: aa wa dh'u t'i dbus su rgyug / la la n'a dang ra sa n'a //
T02D2184:50b-14: g-yas dang g-yon du rgyug pa yin //
T02D2184:50b-15: de rnams nang na rdo rje rlung //
T02D2184:50b-16: phra mo dag ni gnas pa yin //
T02D2184:50b-17: de la rten gyi byang chub sems //
T02D2184:50b-18: nyi ma'i zer bzhin khyab par gnas //
T02D2184:50b-19: bde chen tshangs pa'i mthongs khung nas //
T02D2184:50b-20: rdo rje nor bu mthar thug par //
T02D2184:50b-21: shin tu khyab par rgyas pa yin //
T02D2184:50b-22: gtum mo sbar ba'i stobs kyis ni //
T02D2184:50b-23: de nyid gsal ba rgyas pa dang //
T02D2184:50b-24: byang chub sems kyang shin tu gsal //
T02D2184:50b-25: de la brten pa'i byang chub sems //
T02D2184:50b-27: bde chen 'khor lo'i gnas dag tu //
T02D2184:50b-28: dga' ba skyes pa bum pa'i dbang //
T02D2184:50b-29: 'bras bu yang ni bstan pa yin //
T02D2184:50b-30: la la dag gi bzhed kyis ni //
T02D2184:50b-31: rtsa dang rlung dang brten pa la ;
T02D2184:50b-32: / bshad tshul bzhi yis bum pa'i dbang //
T02D2184:50b-33: dngos su dga' ba'i don la yang //
T02D2184:50b-34: dga' bde bzhi yi don tshang bas //
T02D2184:50b-35: bum pa'i dbang bzhi de la sbyar //
T02D2184:50b-36: mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo la //
T02D2184:50b-37: rtsa rlung rten dang brten pa la //
T02D2184:50b-38: shes pa'i dbang ni tshul bzhin bshad //
T02D2184:50b-39: de ni mchog dga' skye ba'i sa //
T02D2184:50b-40: mchog dga' nyid dang dga' bzhi tshang //
T02D2184:50b-41: gsang ba'i dbang bzhi de la sbyar //
T02D2184:50b-42: snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo la //
T02D2184:50b-43: khyad par dga' ba bskyed pa'i sa //
T02D2184:50b-44: rlung sogs shes rab ye shes dbang //
T02D2184:50b-45: khyad par dga' ba de la yang //
T02D2184:50b-46: dga' bzhi skyed pa'i rim pa la //
T02D2184:50b-47: shes rab ye shes don shes bya //
T02D2184:50b-48: lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo la //
T02D2184:50b-49: lhan cig skyes pa dga' ba'i sa //
T02D2184:50b-50: mthar thug bzhi yi dbang 'di yin //
T02D2184:50b-51: de yi gzhung lugs gnyis po yang //
T02D2184:50b-52: man ngag rim par sbyar bar bya //
T02D2184:50b-53: bzhi pa de la'ang gnyis su bstan //
T02D2184:50b-54: rten bcas dang ni rten med do //
T02D2184:51a-1: bcas la yang gnyis su bstan //
T02D2184:51a-2: spros bcas dang ni spros med do //
T02D2184:51a-3: rten bcas gtum mo nyid la brten //
T02D2184:51a-4: spros bcas kun du bzang mo'i mkha' //
T02D2184:51a-5: rnam dag klong dkyil bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2184:51a-6: ye shes thams kyis mtshon byed ni //
T02D2184:51a-7: man ngag spros te bstan pas su //
T02D2184:51a-8: mkha' dbyings rnam dag rtogs par 'gyur //
T02D2184:51a-9: spros med man ngag bstan pa ni //
T02D2184:51a-10: gong gi man ngag de dag kun //
T02D2184:51a-11: 'di yis rtogs pa spang bya yin //
T02D2184:51a-12: dngos po gnas pa'i gnas lugs ni //
T02D2184:51a-13: rang gi byang chub sems nyid ni //
T02D2184:51a-14: dkar po la sogs ma yin zhing //
T02D2184:51a-15: mtshon byed kun gyis mtshon du med //
T02D2184:51a-16: shas brjod kun las 'das pas na //
T02D2184:51a-17: gang du yang ni bsam du med //
T02D2184:51a-18: yengs su yang ni rdul tsam med //
T02D2184:51a-19: chos rnams ye nas skye med la //
T02D2184:51a-20: skye ba med ces sgro mi 'dogs //
T02D2184:51a-21: chos su snang ba 'khrul pa'i sems //
T02D2184:51a-22: sems nyid ye nas skye med la //
T02D2184:51a-23: skye ba med ces sgro mi 'dogs //
T02D2184:51a-24: blun po gang zhig mi shes pas //
T02D2184:51a-25: dper na nam mkha' 'di med ces //
T02D2184:51a-27: rnal 'byor mkhas pa rnams kyis su //
T02D2184:51a-28: skye ba med la sogs pa ru //
T02D2184:51a-29: ye nyid nas su sgro mi 'dogs //
T02D2184:51a-30: de lta bu ye don nyid la //
T02D2184:51a-31: the tshom med par gtan la dbab //
T02D2184:51a-32: de nas rnal 'byor gdeng gyur pas //
T02D2184:51a-33: bsam ded yengs med tsam du ni //
T02D2184:51a-34: bsgom pas man ngag rtogs par 'gyur //
T02D2184:51a-35: de ltar rtogs pas rdzogs rim gyi //
T02D2184:51a-36: dbang gi man ngag mthar thug yin //
T02D2184:51a-37: rab tu gnas pa'i rdzogs rim yang //
T02D2184:51a-38: rnal 'byor mkhas pas sbyor shes bya'o //
T02D2184:51a-39: mi mkhas pas ni dug tu 'gyur //
T02D2184:51a-40: de yang dus skabs bzhi ru ni //
T02D2184:51a-41: rim pa bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
T02D2184:51a-42: dang po bya ba'i dus dag ni //
T02D2184:51a-43: sngon du 'gro ba rdzogs byas la //
T02D2184:51a-44: nam mkhar gnas pa de dag la //
T02D2184:51a-45: sngon gyi bzhin du gsol ba dang ba //
T02D2184:51a-46: cho ga yan lag rdzogs byas nas //
T02D2184:51a-47: dag pa la sogs byas pa la //
T02D2184:51a-48: dang po de la nus pa gzhug / nus mthu bskyed pa'i cho ga ni //
T02D2184:51a-49: byas nas de la chogs bsag go //
T02D2184:51a-50: de nas dus ni gnyis pa ru //
T02D2184:51a-52: snying ga'i pho brang gnas dag tu //
T02D2184:51a-53: de dang de ni tha mi dang //
T02D2184:51b-0: de nyid @51b la ni de nyid kyis //
T02D2184:51b-1: de nyid du ni cung zhig tu //
T02D2184:51b-2: de yi de yi thams kyis su //
T02D2184:51b-3: de lta de ltar rdzogs par bya //
T02D2184:51b-4: dus ni gsum pa dag la ni //
T02D2184:51b-5: ye shes thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2184:51b-6: 'khor lo rten gyi gnas dag tu //
T02D2184:51b-7: de nyid de ltar gnas pa na //
T02D2184:51b-8: de nyid la ni de nyid do //
T02D2184:51b-9: de nyid thabs kyi sbyor bas su //
T02D2184:51b-10: de de man ngag rdzogs par thob //
T02D2184:51b-11: dus ni bzhi bdag la yang //
T02D2184:51b-12: rnam rgyud stobs kyi spyod yul yin //
T02D2184:51b-13: de ltar rab gnas rdzogs rim bya //
T02D2184:51b-14: rdo rje nor bu'i rtsa ba ru //
T02D2184:51b-15: dga' ba skyes pa bum pa'i dbang //
T02D2184:51b-16: gsang ba'i pho brang gnas dag tu //
T02D2184:51b-17: mchog dga' skyes pa gsang ba'i dbang //
T02D2184:51b-18: khyad par dga' ba'i gnas dag tu //
T02D2184:51b-19: khyad par dga' ba skyes pa ni //
T02D2184:51b-20: shes rab ye shes dbang nyid do //
T02D2184:51b-21: rin chen pho brang gnas dag tu //
T02D2184:51b-22: lhan cig dga' ba skyes pa ni //
T02D2184:51b-23: dbang ni bzhi par shes par bya //
T02D2184:51b-24: de la rdzogs rim las kyi rim //
T02D2184:51b-25: phreng ba lta bur brgyud de 'ongs //
T02D2184:51b-26: de dag drag po'i las sogs rnams //
T02D2184:51b-27: rin chen phreng ba ltar brgyud 'di //
T02D2184:51b-28: srog lus rdzas rnams 'bul byed pa'i //
T02D2184:51b-29: rin chen lta bu'i gang zag la //
T02D2184:51b-30: btsa' dka' dam bzhag byas te gtad //
T02D2184:51b-31: de ltar mi byed rmongs pas su //
T02D2184:51b-32: dam med rmongs pa'i lag shor na //
T02D2184:51b-33: dus min shi nas dmyal bar ltung //
T02D2184:51b-34: de nas nan tan bskyed de btsa' //
T02D2184:51b-35: bdag gis sems can gdon pa'i phyir //
T02D2184:51b-36: man ngag rin chen 'di byas pas //
T02D2184:51b-37: bdag dang 'gro ba'i sems can rnams //
T02D2184:51b-38: phyag rgya mchog ni thob par shog / las kyi
T02D2184:51b-39: rim pa mu tig phreng ba zhes bya ba slob
T02D2184:51b-40: dpon bha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2184:51b-42: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon b'ir+ya gu pa s'u tr'i zhal snga nas dang /
T02D2184:51b-43: lo ts'a ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus te /
